issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Need to convert automatically convert Decimal64ColumnVector key/value expressions to DecimalColumnVector.

vector_decimal_mapjoin.q was changed to use text format and have join values for the small decimal queries to trigger the issue.
fields.summary: Vectorization: VectorMapJoinOperator Decimal64ColumnVector key/value cast bug
